channel.title: Steelseries Contest
channel.description:
Steelseries is having a 10th anniversary competition, giving out lots of goodies! :smiley: It's a typical self-advertising giveaway, you recruit people and increase your chances... shameless plug here:
On that note, I'm in need of a new mouse and keyboard. Any brand or model recommendations for general purpose and gaming usage? More than anything, I just need something that's reliable. I prefer simple, compact mouses rather than ones with tons of buttons. DPI and whatnot is not that big of a deal. Same deal with keyboards - don't like lots of extra goodies, just something simple and well-built.

item.title: Steelseries Contest
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
I really like the Logitech G500
